response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to both of us, as it's worth $10,000 to you and represents a significant investment for me. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an offer to sell it to you for $9,500. I believe this price reflects the value we both see in the product while allowing us to reach a fair agreement. Please let me know if this proposal works for you.", "product_price": 9500}
